## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT2G32200](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT2G32200)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AthCYSTM5</u>
- **Gene Name:** Cysteine-Rich Transmembrane Module 5
- **Description:**   cysteine-rich/transmembrane domain A-like protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2045507
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [SALK_034929C]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Seedlings screened in bulk via high throughput methods for responses to various stressors. Results  are in comparison to Col-0.heat:no change,cold:increased,oxidative stress:no change,osmotic stress:no change,salt stress:decreased,ABA:decreased,hypoxia:ND.
